daily_overview: This daily log records verified real-world activities at MaMeeFarm, including environmental monitoring, animal care, land maintenance, and food preparation, documented under DGCP ground-truth principles.

proofs.summary: Morning temperature and humidity measurement recorded before work began.
Dogs observed during morning feeding, demonstrating farm security and daily routine.
Morning inspection of the last remaining duck. Duck appeared healthy; no egg observed.
Manual trimming and maintenance of banana trees at the back of the farm.
Cooking rice using a traditional wood-fired stove to sustain all lives on the farm.
